display_long_description:
Drive X: The Ultimate VR Arcade Racing Experience

Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled ride through breathtaking landscapes. Drive X brings the excitement of arcade racing to your Meta Quest. Take control of a high-performance supercar and prove your skills on challenging tracks.

Key Features:

High-Speed Action: Push your car to the limit. Experience smooth and fast-paced gameplay optimized for VR.

Stunning Environments: Race through detailed mountain passes and scenic roads filled with dynamic falling leaves and atmospheric lighting.

Competitive Rivals: You are not alone on the track. Go head-to-head against intelligent AI drivers who will challenge your every move.

Track Your Success: Keep an eye on the live rank list and lap times. Can you beat the competition and finish 1st?

Master the Drift: Use your driving skills to navigate sharp corners and maintain your speed on the asphalt.

Whether you are a casual player or a racing enthusiast, Drive X offers an immersive and fun driving experience. Start your engine and dominate the track today!
